resources.string: It\'s never to late for a coffee

Welcome to Lunchtime

Explore where and what you can eat for lunch and who may come with you.

Hide offers you are not interested in, such as meat if your are vegetarian.

Contribute by giving feedback, contributing code, or adding new restaurants.

About this version

This is under development. Hence, not all features are implemented yet.

Legal information

This is developed by Timo Bähr inside his leisure time. By using this app you confirm not to make him liable for any damages which are caused by the app\'s usage.
No offers for today, my friends think you are a cooking genius.
No offers for today, the secret to a clean kitchen is simple, don\'t cook.
No offers for today, make full use of your burger rights, go voting.
No offers for today, a messy kitchen is a sign of happiness.
No offers for today. The onions aren\'t making me cry, it\'s being in the kitchen in general.
